snippet: An independent investigator said the State Department provided an “inaccurate or incomplete” response when a watchdog group asked whether Mrs. Clinton used alternate email accounts.
abstract: Independent investigator finds State Dept's response to request by watchdog group Citizens for Responsibility and Ethics in Washington for public records on Hillary Clinton's email use as secretary of state was inaccurate and incomplete; report, along with public release of more of Clinton's emails from that time, suggest issue of her email use will continue to be brought up during 2016 presidential election.
lead_paragraph: An independent investigator said the State Department provided an “inaccurate or incomplete” response when a watchdog group asked whether Mrs. Clinton used alternate email accounts.

headline.main: Response on Hillary Clinton Email ‘Incomplete,’ Report Finds
headline.print_headline: Response on Clinton Email ‘Incomplete,’ Report Finds

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Citizens for Responsibility and Ethics in Washington
